content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position y)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position z)
- Assembling machine (position a) that requires iron-plate to craft iron-gear-wheel and iron-stick

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available in your inventory or produced in a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have enough materials for crafting and extraction tasks.
